meaning_str.bing:
adv. 很快；不久；马上；早
n. 【女名】女子名
网络. 一会儿；立刻；很快地

很快；迅速；立即；即刻；稍后；一会儿；不久；马上；早日；及早；较早；早些时候；宁愿；宁可

1.en: All parents soon realise how much of child-rearing is improvisation, tempered by exhaustion.
1.cn: 所有的父母不久都发觉抚养子女实际就像经过疲劳磨练的即兴演出。

2.en: It's going to be very tough -- practically impossible, really -- for the Spurs to improve that talent anytime soon.
2.cn: 这将会变得非常困难--确实不可能--对于马刺来说在短时间内提升天赋。

3.en: She was falling fast, if she did not get her chute open soon she was going to die.
3.cn: 她往下坠的速度很快，如果降落伞不快点打开，她便要一命呜呼了。

0.en: Thank you all very much. More soon.
0.cn: 非常感谢大家。很快会有更多消息。

1.en: Soon. It just never seemed like the right time.
1.cn: 很快，只是时机一直不对。

2.en: Pretty soon you're all going to join the work force.
2.cn: 很快你们就会参加工作。

3.en: He's going to make his play soon, though. Today.
3.cn: 他应该很快实施他的计划，在今天。

4.en: I'm waiting for a friend. He should be here soon.
4.cn: 我在这等个朋友，他应该很快就到了。

5.en: I will be returning to Gusteau's soon, hungry for more.
5.cn: 我很快会再度光临食神餐厅，满足我的口腹之欲。

6.en: Soon, real soon. Come on. I wanna show you something else. Come on.
6.cn: 很快，很快就可以了，来吧，我想给你看点别的，跟我来。

7.en: Oh, and just think. Soon there'll be lots of little Bings.
7.cn: 你想想，很快地就会出现很多小宾。

8.en: As I say, Hanna Schmitz is coming up for release very soon.
8.cn: 正如我信中所说汉娜·施密茨很快就要刑满释放了。

9.en: Soon he'll be able to call you, that lady he knew who got fired.
9.cn: 很快的，他就可以叫你“那个被开除的女人”。

10.en: So you will kill this woman to save my life? It will all be over very soon.
10.cn: 你要杀这个女人来救我？很快就会结束的。

11.en: As you will no doubt soon discover, not everyone agrees with our methods.
11.cn: 很快你就会发现，不是所有人都同意我们的方案。

12.en: Ok, but get the potatoes in the oven, the others will be here soon.
12.cn: 好的，但是把土豆放到烤箱里吧，其他人很快就会到了。

13.en: I'm sure that will happen soon enough. But in the meantime, I still want oatmeal.
13.cn: 这个愿望很快就能实现了，但我还是要燕麦粥。

14.en: Ah, ha. I've found our little hill. We'll soon be home. Hooray.
14.cn: 啊，哈。我已经找到我们的小山了。我们很快就会到家了。好棒！

15.en: Should we be expecting him anytime soon? Not as long as the cigars and brandy hold out.
15.cn: 他会很快回来吗? 只要还有烟酒，就不会。

16.en: Careful, I saw this on Star Trek. Smoke's gonna come out of his ears soon.
16.cn: 小心点，我在《星际迷航》看过这幕。很快他耳朵要冒出蒸汽了。

17.en: Don't worry. It'll be over soon and we can go get a treat. I'm thinking ice cream.
17.cn: 别担心。很快就弄好了之后给你买好吃的，冰激凌怎么样。

18.en: I'm getting ready to retire soon. Retirement means reinventing yourself in many ways.
18.cn: 我很快就准备退休了。退休意味着各个方面重塑你自身。

19.en: Eggs? I can't see any eggs? Not now, but there will be eggs soon. Woooo.
19.cn: 下蛋？可是我什么东西都没有看到呀？还没有呢，但是很快就会有了。噢。
